attributes.action: Glenn Murray to be in the England 1st team squad for the 2018 World Cup
attributes.additional_details: Glenn Murray offers a maturity to the squad at the age of 34 but also bringing a debutants passion and desire that some of the current English squad have been accused of lacking.
attributes.background: Glenn Murray should be on that plane going to the world cup. He has scored 11 goals this season. Murray is the fourth top English goalscorer in the Premier League right now equal with Eden Hazard, of whom he also has a better minutes per goal ratio.
